paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the use of iPSC-derived cardiomyocytes to model drug-induced long QT syndrome, focusing on the KCNH2 gene. However, no specific genetic variants in KCNH2 are mentioned.

tables_processed.table_caption: Demographic, clinical and electrocardiographic baseline characteristics of subjects with low- vs. high- sensitivity to Sotalol.
Fibroblasts and iPS quality control parameters.

challenges: No specific KCNH2 variants were mentioned in the text or tables.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper focuses on the functional modeling of drug response using iPSCs but does not provide specific genetic variant data for KCNH2.
